column2: SELECT * FROM students WHERE username ='{0}' AND password ='{1}'
SELECT * FROM teachers WHERE username ='{0}' AND password ='{1}'

SELECT s.id, s.fname, s.lname, c.id, c.name, c.points, c.description, t.fname AS teacher_fname, t.lname AS teacher_lname FROM student_course sc LEFT JOIN students s ON sc.student_id = s.id LEFT JOIN courses c ON sc.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN teacher_course tc ON c.id = tc.course_id LEFT JOIN teachers t ON tc.teacher_id = t.id WHERE s.id = ?

SELECT s.id, s.fname, s.lname, c.id, c.name, c.points, c.description, t.fname AS teacher_fname, t.lname AS teacher_lname FROM student_course sc LEFT JOIN students s ON sc.student_id = s.id LEFT JOIN courses c ON sc.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN teacher_course tc ON c.id = tc.course_id LEFT JOIN teachers t ON tc.teacher_id = t.id WHERE t.id = ?
INSERT INTO students (fname, lname, town, email, phone, username, password) VALUES ('{0}', '{1}', '{2}', '{3}', '{4}', '{5}', '{6}')
